nodes.text: Ara was slave taken from her primitive homeworld. Her master, Deezoth Caraz, was killed at Ord Mynock Freeport while transporting her and another slave, Kema Forge.

Ara was a female from a primitive forest world that was located far away from the regularly traveled hyperspace routes. A healer to her people, she was captured by slavers and put in the custody of Deezoth Caraz and his bodyguard Vok to be given to a Hutt crime lord along with another slave named Kema Forge.

During the trip, the group stopped on Ord Mynock where Ara was put to work getting drinks for Caraz. She desperately wanted to escape, and was fascinated by the galaxy she had been exposed to. She tried to convince Forge to help her.
While being from a primitive world, Ara was very curious and interested in exploring the galaxy. She was considered a healer among her people.
